Room.Name: Lelion Wildlife Preserve
Room.ShortDescription: This is the northern extreme of the Lelion Beach and Park wildlife preserve.
Room.LongDescription: You are on a small piece of land which juts into the stream, forming a break for the fast moving water coming from the east. The Lithium Inlet is between the Laynden lake to the east and the Nylandian Bay to the west, and is an excellent fishing waters. A wooden pier extends to the north, into the quieter water of the inlet. The path you are on continues in both the east and west directions.
